document_data.name: Move Object
document_data.mainbody: '''''Move object''''' was an uncommon [[alteration]] spell of the [[southern magic]] tradition.{{Southernmagic}} It was popular with [[Mentalist (wizard)|mentalists]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the caster was able to move a single small object, within 10 yard (9 meter). The caster's skill level determined how heavy the object could be. The spell was unable to perform complex movements nor could it animate objects.
document_data.Components: The spell only required a [[somatic]] component.
